pullRequest.title: [Enhancement] Add bonus to views and some renamings
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) locally.
 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes
 Client: I translated all the newly inserted strings into German and English

Motivation and Context


As we added bonus points to exercises, we want to display them as well in different views.
Description


Added bonus points to some views
Changed some translations (Exercise Type -> Type, Max Points -> Points)

Steps for Testing


Log in to Artemis
Navigate to Course Administration and
Go to Assessment/Instructor Dashboard of a course and then to Exercise Dashboard
Check if for exercises with bonus points the bonus points are displayed as well also (Exercise Type -> Type, Max Points -> Points)
Navigate to Course Overview and go into a course
Enter a Exercise and check if for exercises with bonus points the bonus points are displayed as well
Go to Course Administration and then to Exams
Check Exercise Groups and check that it says Points and not Max. Points
Participate in Exam (or do a test run) check if for exercises (modeling, text and programming) with bonus points the bonus points are displayed as well

Check also if I missed some other spots where this can be changed/added (see also comments in discussion). Just let me know :)
Test Coverage

Nothing changed
Screenshots


Student Exercise Details View:
Bonus:

No Bonus:

Assessment Dashboard:

Instructor Dashboard:

Exam:

commit.message: add bonus points if applicable and change exercise type to type and max. points to points

nodes.bodyText:
Can we move the closing tags onto the same line? (Here and in the files below.) Imho
<span
    >

looks very weird compared to just having <span> when there are no attributes.

commit.message: Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into enhancement/add-bonus-to-views
fix remaining max. points in exam views + try to fix issue with space
add bonus points to exercise view
try to fix issue in summary view and add translation changes of exam
